title: Is Being "Pre-Engaged" Even A Real Thing?!
description:
If a couple claims to be engaged but neither the man nor woman in the engagement proposed, then is it technically considered an engagement or just an understanding? And should the family get excited and invest time and money into what’s just an understanding and not an official thing?
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
